## About
Hello world! I'm LuÃ­s Galete, a self-proclaimed digital craftsman, music enthusiast, anime connoisseur and coffee addict. I started coding because I wanted to turn my dumb ideas into reality, and that's what I'm currently focused on. There is still a long way to go, but you can check out what I have built so far in [my website](https://luisgalete.com.br/).
